inclusion.criterion: Age at randomization between 9 and 18 years inclusively
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Interval between diagnosis and randomization between 2 weeks and 6 months after the diagnosis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Concurrent treatment with corticosteroids and/or enteral nutrition and/or thiopurines (azathioprine, 6-mercaptopurine) and/or methotrexate and/or 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA) and/or TNF-α inhibitors (Infliximab, Adalimumab)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age at randomization between 9 and 18 years inclusively
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient diagnosed with severe complex perianal fistulizing CD (defined as the presence at diagnosis of a high intersphincteric, transsphincteric, extrasphincteric, or suprasphincteric complex perianal fistula)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known chronic liver cholestasis (defined by an elevation of conjugated bilirubin and/or gamma glutamyl transferase > 3 upper limit normal)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known renal dysfunction requiring chronic dialysis or creatinine ≥ 100 micromol/L.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. His sister had the same problems.
